projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.subtitle: Full-stack mobile & web application
projects.description: A comprehensive e-commerce platform with real-time inventory management, payment integration, and AI-powered product recommendations. Built with Flutter for cross-platform consistency and Firebase for backend services.
projects.longDescription: Developed a scalable e-commerce solution serving 50,000+ users with advanced features including real-time chat support, AR product visualization, personalized recommendations using machine learning, and seamless payment processing. The platform reduced cart abandonment by 35% and increased customer satisfaction scores by 40%.

projects.title: Healthcare Management System
projects.subtitle: HIPAA-compliant patient portal
projects.description: A secure healthcare management platform enabling telemedicine consultations, appointment scheduling, electronic health records, and prescription management with end-to-end encryption.
projects.longDescription: Created a HIPAA-compliant healthcare solution that streamlined patient-doctor interactions, reducing appointment no-shows by 45% and improving patient engagement. Integrated with major EHR systems and implemented video consultation features that served 10,000+ virtual appointments monthly.

projects.title: Smart Home Dashboard
projects.subtitle: IoT control center
projects.description: An intuitive dashboard for controlling smart home devices with voice commands, automation rules, energy monitoring, and predictive analytics for optimal home management.
projects.longDescription: Designed and developed a unified smart home control system supporting 50+ device types from various manufacturers. Implemented ML-based automation that reduced energy consumption by 25% and enhanced home security through intelligent pattern recognition.

projects.title: Social Media Analytics Tool
projects.subtitle: Data-driven insights platform
projects.description: A powerful analytics platform providing real-time social media metrics, sentiment analysis, competitor tracking, and automated reporting for businesses and influencers.
projects.longDescription: Built an enterprise-grade analytics solution processing 1M+ social media posts daily. Implemented natural language processing for sentiment analysis, trend detection, and automated insights generation, helping brands increase engagement by 60%.

projects.title: Fitness Tracking App
projects.subtitle: Personal health companion
projects.description: A comprehensive fitness application with workout plans, nutrition tracking, progress analytics, social challenges, and integration with wearable devices for holistic health management.
projects.longDescription: Developed a cross-platform fitness app that helped 25,000+ users achieve their health goals. Features include personalized workout recommendations, meal planning, progress tracking with beautiful visualizations, and a supportive community feature that increased user retention by 55%.

projects.title: Virtual Event Platform
projects.subtitle: Next-gen online conferences
projects.description: An immersive virtual event platform with 3D environments, networking lounges, interactive booths, live streaming, and AI-powered matchmaking for meaningful connections.
projects.longDescription: Created an innovative virtual events solution during the pandemic that hosted 100+ conferences with 50,000+ attendees. Featured spatial audio, 3D avatars, virtual booths with product demos, and intelligent networking algorithms that facilitated 10,000+ meaningful business connections.
